resources.string: This activity\'s content depends on the metadata transferred by the parent activity. It usually contains list of particular playlists. The song which is playing now is displayed in the fragment.

This activity\'s content depends on the metadata transferred by the parent activity. It usually shows the album picture and list of tracks located in the playlist (the album). The song which is playing now is displayed in the fragment at the bottom.
This activity show to user label of the album, the song\'s info and controls
This activity contains the most popular songs, collections and artists among the user\'s friends. The song which is playing now is displayed in the fragment at the bottom.
Server is not available right now :(
This activity contains all audio resources that match the user\'s request. Need to attach the json reader and to build the server with API.

This activity shows the received form from the server. By filling this form user is able to log in and download and listen music offline, or listen to music which isn\'t available without registration.
This activity allows user to configure settings of the app such as:\\n- the network mode\\n- the equlizer settings\\n- the import of playlists
